title: An Overview of Challenges in Egocentric Text-Video Retrieval. (arXiv:2306.04345v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Text-video retrieval contains various challenges, including biases coming from diverse sources. We highlight some of them supported by illustrations to open a discussion. Besides, we address one of the biases, frame length bias, with a simple method which brings a very incremental but promising increase. We conclude with future directions.

translated_abstract: "文本-视频检索面临着来自多个方面的偏差等挑战，本文针对一些偏差进行了探讨和阐述，并提出了一种简单的帧长偏差纠正方法，该方法取得了显著的增长，但仍有改进空间。最后，我们总结了未来的发展方向。"
tldr: 本文综述了Egocentric Text-Video Retrieval领域中的挑战，针对"frame length bias"提出了有效的纠正方法。
en_tdlr: This paper provides an overview of challenges in Egocentric Text-Video Retrieval, highlights biases from diverse sources, and proposes a simple method to address the frame length bias, which shows a promising increase with room for improvement. Future directions are also discussed.
